name: headscale
description: Headscale is an open-source control server for Tailscale networks. It manages lightweight peer-to-peer VPN meshes using WireGuard, enabling private secure networking without relying on external cloud services.

features.title: Tailscale Compatible
features.description: Open-source control server compatible with Tailscale clients across all platforms

features.title: Wireguard Mesh
features.description: Build secure peer-to-peer VPN networks using modern WireGuard protocol

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own coordination server without relying on Tailscale's cloud service

features.title: Zero Configuration
features.description: Automatic NAT traversal and firewall penetration for seamless connectivity

features.title: Cross
features.description: Connect devices running Linux, macOS, Windows, iOS, and Android

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Define which devices can communicate using flexible ACL policies

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage with efficient connection management

features.title: Private Networking
features.description: Create secure networks for accessing home services or connecting remote sites
